title: 2018 Week 2 Recap
itunes:title: 2018 Week 2 Recap
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling with guest heroes Nick Shook and Jeremy Bergman – recap an action-packed Week 2, including a rematch of last season’s AFC Championship game (3:45), the NFL’s newest star, Patrick Mahomes, lights up the Steelers (10:50), FITZMagic continues (36:20), is it time to start Josh Rosen (52:00), Frank Reich earns his first win (59:50) and an NFC East clash on Sunday Night Football (1:13:30)!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
